description:
We are a team of professional technocrats with clear vision, mission, and common goal. We have sound experience and expertise of over 15+ years in the field of web and mobile application development.
Since our inception in 2000, we always thrive about creating beautiful work inside and out by offering expert, creative and strategic skills to every project we undertake.
Our all work includes trust, honesty, and peace of mind as standard. We are focused to provide visually appealing yet highly functional, feature rich websites and mobile applications.
We adhere to the highest standards of technical excellence and creativity. We foster collaboration and team spirit throughout the organization, in both internal and external engagement.
We create performance packed and intuitive iPhone, iPad & Android Applications with full focus on user experience.
We develop robust Enterprise Web Applications & Portals.
We design & develop Responsive, Feature-Rich Websites that help generate business volume.
We deliver simple, user-friendly customized CMS & E-Commerce Solutions.
We have sound experience and are very good at providing Mobile-Enabled IOT solutions.
Here at Bit01, we are constantly on the lookout for new professional partnerships. As an inclusive company with experience in dealing with international business propositions, we like to think of ourselves as one giant corporate family.
Over the period we have worked with numbers of (100+) satisfied agencies, understanding their needs and providing custom solutions in the form of corporate websites and mobile applications.
Our collaborative partners are assured, a vast knowledge of coding, best practices, accessibility expertise, and cutting-edge approaches.
You are invited to share your ideas, projects or requirements with us, we, in turn, shall get back promptly.
